action.action-desc: Mr. Boozman (for himself and Mr. Buyer) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veteransâ€™ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to reauthorize the Homeless Veterans Reintegration Program for fiscal years 2010 through 2014.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Homeless Veterans Reintegration Program Reauthorization Act of 2009.

section.header: Reauthorization of appropriations for Homeless Veterans Reintegration Program
section.text: Section 2021(e)(1)(F) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking 2009 and inserting 2014.
